I have ordered this item a lot and only remember getting a slightly dented can once. I don't think it was sent to me that way, but that the denting was done in shipping, because the box I got it in was damaged also. Don't be afraid to buy this product. It's a great product with a great price.

t: r/mildlyinfuriating on Reddit: Can of food from Amazon came dented to the point where its contents are exposed. Contacted support and got told no refunds.
s: June 26, 2024 - It's hard to see but the can isn't sealed anymore around the dent. In general you shouldn't eat food from dented cans whether the puncture is visible or not.
